name: Carded Hard
description:
Player 1 Controls: WASD to move, shift key to shoot

Player 2 Controls: Arrow keys to move, > key to shoot

Objective:

Throw Cards at each other to deal damage. The amount of damage is dependent on the number the card has.

Cards can clash with one another to combine values. Last man standing wins.

Good luck and have fun!

Credits: JohnLee Cooper, Jesse Baker, Justin Capcap, Aaron Sutton, Matt Murch
